mapper.sql: id, username, password, phone, address, nickname, sex, headIcon, funs, attentions, score, isStudent, studentId, studentPic, idCard, idCardPic, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_user_Detail
username = #{map.username},
password = #{map.password},
phone = #{map.phone},
address = #{map.address},
nickname = #{map.nickname},
sex = #{map.sex},
headIcon = #{map.headIcon},
funs = #{map.funs},
attentions = #{map.attentions},
score = #{map.score},
isStudent = #{map.isStudent},
studentId = #{map.studentId},
studentPic = #{map.studentPic},
idCard = #{map.idCard},
idCardPic = #{map.idCardPic},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_user_Detail
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND username like CONCAT('%', #{username} , '%')
AND password like CONCAT('%', #{password} , '%')
AND phone like CONCAT('%', #{phone} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{address} , '%')
AND nickname like CONCAT('%', #{nickname} , '%')
AND sex like CONCAT('%', #{sex} , '%')
AND headIcon like CONCAT('%', #{headIcon} , '%')
AND funs like CONCAT('%', #{funs} , '%')
AND attentions like CONCAT('%', #{attentions} , '%')
AND score like CONCAT('%', #{score} , '%')
AND isStudent like CONCAT('%', #{isStudent} , '%')
AND studentId like CONCAT('%', #{studentId} , '%')
AND studentPic like CONCAT('%', #{studentPic} , '%')
AND idCard like CONCAT('%', #{idCard} , '%')
AND idCardPic like CONCAT('%', #{idCardPic} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
